abstractcontenthubitemtype.name: AbstractContentHubItemType
abstractcontenthubitemtype.description: An item type associated with a repository folder.

abstractdirectoryentrysummary.name: AbstractDirectoryEntrySummary
abstractdirectoryentrysummary.description: A directory entry with summary information.

abstractmessagebody.name: AbstractMessageBody
abstractmessagebody.description: A recommended action of recommendation strategy.

abstractnbaaction.name: AbstractNBAAction
abstractnbaaction.description: A recommendation target of a recommendation strategy.

abstractnbatarget.name: AbstractNBATarget
abstractnbatarget.description: A recommendation target of a recommendation strategy.

abstractrecommendation.name: AbstractRecommendation
abstractrecommendation.description: A Chatter, custom, or static recommendation.

actionlinkdefinition.name: ActionLinkDefinition
actionlinkdefinition.description: The definition of an action link.  Action link definition can be sensitive to a third party (for example, OAuth bearer token headers). For this reason, only calls made from the Apex namespace that created the action link definition can read, modify, or delete the definition. In addition, the user making the call must have created the definition or have View All Data permission.

actionlinkdefinitioninput.name: ActionLinkDefinitionInput
actionlinkdefinitioninput.description: The definition of an action link. An action link is a button on a feed element. Clicking an action link can take a user to a Web page, initiate a file download, or invoke an API call to Salesforce or to an external server. An action link includes a URL and an HTTP method, and can include a request body and header information, such as an OAuth token for authentication. Use action links to integrate Salesforce and third-party services into the feed so that users can take action to drive productivity and accelerate innovation.

actionlinkdiagnosticinfo.name: ActionLinkDiagnosticInfo
actionlinkdiagnosticinfo.description: The definition of an action link.  Action link definition can be sensitive to a third party (for example, OAuth bearer token headers). For this reason, only calls made from the Apex namespace that created the action link definition can read, modify, or delete the definition. In addition, the user making the call must have created the definition or have View All Data permission.

actionlinkgroupdefinition.name: ActionLinkGroupDefinition
actionlinkgroupdefinition.description: The definition of an action link group. Information in the action link group definition can be sensitive to a third party (for example, OAuth bearer token headers). For this reason, only calls made from the Apex namespace that created the action link group definition can read, modify, or delete the definition. In addition, the user making the call must have created the definition or have View All Data permission.

actionlinkgroupdefinitioninput.name: ActionLinkGroupDefinitionInput
actionlinkgroupdefinitioninput.description: The definition of an action link group. All action links must belong to a group. Action links in a group are mutually exclusive and share some properties. Define stand-alone actions in their own action group.

actionlinks.name: ActionLinks
actionlinks.description: Create, delete, and get information about an action link group definition; get information about an action link group; get action link diagnostic information.

activitysharinginput.name: ActivitySharingInput
activitysharinginput.description: Defines who a captured email or event is shared with.

activitysharingresult.name: ActivitySharingResult
activitysharingresult.description: The results of sharing a captured email or event.

alternative.name: Alternative
alternative.description: Alternative representation for an extension on a feed element.

announcement.name: Announcement
announcement.description: An announcement displays in a designated location in the Salesforce UI until 11:59 p.m. on its expiration date, unless it’s deleted or replaced by another announcement.

announcements.name: Announcements
announcements.description: Access information about announcements and post announcements.

approvalcapability.name: ApprovalCapability
approvalcapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it includes information about an approval.

approvalintent.name: ApprovalIntent
approvalintent.description: Approval intent for a social post.

articleitem.name: ArticleItem
articleitem.description: Article item in question and answers suggestions.

articletopicassignmentjobinput.name: ArticleTopicAssignmentJobInput
articletopicassignmentjobinput.description: An article and topic assignment job.

associatedactionscapability.name: AssociatedActionsCapability
associatedactionscapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has platform actions associated with it.

associatedactions​capabilityinput.name: AssociatedActions​CapabilityInput
associatedactions​capabilityinput.description: A list of action link groups to associate with a feed element. To associate an action link group with a feed element, the call must be made from the Apex namespace that created the action link definition. In addition, the user making the call must have created the definition or have View All Data permission.

audiencetarget.name: AudienceTarget
audiencetarget.description: Personalization audience assigned to a target.

audiencetargetassignment.name: AudienceTargetAssignment
audiencetargetassignment.description: Target assignments for a personalization audience.

bannercapability.name: BannerCapability
bannercapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has a banner motif and style.

basemanagedsocialaccount.name: BaseManagedSocialAccount
basemanagedsocialaccount.description: Base information describing a managed social account or fan page of a social network.

batchinput.name: BatchInput
batchinput.description: Construct a set of inputs to be passed into a method at the same time.

batchresult.name: BatchResult
batchresult.description: The result of an operation returned by a batch method.

bookmarks​capability.name: Bookmarks​Capability
bookmarks​capability.description: If a feed element has this capability, the context user can bookmark it.

bundlecapability.name: BundleCapability
bundlecapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has a container of feed elements called a bundle.

candidateanswers​status.name: CandidateAnswers​Status
candidateanswers​status.description: The status of candidate answers on a feed element.

canvas​capability.name: Canvas​Capability
canvas​capability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it renders a canvas app.

case​commentcapability.name: Case​CommentCapability
case​commentcapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has a case comment on the case feed.

changeinputrepresentation.name: ChangeInputRepresentation
changeinputrepresentation.description: A list of changes to OrderItemSummaries that make up an order change, such as a cancel or return.

changeiteminputrepresentation.name: ChangeItemInputRepresentation
changeiteminputrepresentation.description: Change to an OrderItemSummary, such as a return or cancel. You specify whether to prorate the associated shipping charge based on the price change. The OrderItemSummary can’t be a shipping charge.

changeitemoutputrepresentation.name: ChangeItemOutputRepresentation
changeitemoutputrepresentation.description: Financial information on a change order. The values represent the deltas of the values on the associated OrderSummary.

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.description: Access information about followers and subscriptions for records.

chatterfavorites.name: ChatterFavorites
chatterfavorites.description: Chatter favorites give you easy access to topics, list views, and feed searches.

chatterfeeds.name: ChatterFeeds
chatterfeeds.description: Get, post, and delete feed elements, likes, comments, and bookmarks. You can also search feed elements, share feed elements, and vote on polls.

chattergroups.name: ChatterGroups
chattergroups.description: Information about groups, such as the group’s members, photo, and the groups the specified user is a member of. Add members to a group, remove members, and change the group photo.

chatterlikes​capability.name: ChatterLikes​Capability
chatterlikes​capability.description: If a feed element has this capability, the context user can like it. Exposes information about existing likes.

chattermessages.name: ChatterMessages
chattermessages.description: Access and modify message and conversation data.

chatterstreampage.name: ChatterStreamPage
chatterstreampage.description: A collection of Chatter feed streams.

chatterusers.name: ChatterUsers
chatterusers.description: Access information about users, such as activity, followers, subscriptions, files, and groups.

closecapability.name: CloseCapability
closecapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, users with permission can close it.

commentcapabilities.name: CommentCapabilities
commentcapabilities.description: A set of capabilities on a comment.

communities.name: Communities
communities.description: Access general information about communities in your organization.

communityflag​reasontype.name: CommunityFlag​ReasonType
communityflag​reasontype.description: Reason a post, comment, or file is

communitymoderation.name: CommunityModeration
communitymoderation.description: Access information about flagged feed items and comments in a community. Add and remove flags from comments and feed items.

connectapiexception.name: ConnectApiException
connectapiexception.description: The ConnectApi namespace contains exception classes.

contentcapability.name: ContentCapability
contentcapability.description: If a comment has this capability, it has a file attachment.

contenthub.name: ContentHub
contenthub.description: Access Files Connect repositories and their files and folders.

contenthuballoweditemtypecollection.name: ContentHubAllowedItemTypeCollection
contenthuballoweditemtypecollection.description: The item types that the context user is allowed to create in a repository folder.

contenthubfieldvalueinput.name: ContentHubFieldValueInput
contenthubfieldvalueinput.description: The fields of the item type.

contenthubiteminput.name: ContentHubItemInput
contenthubiteminput.description: The item type ID and fields of the item type.

contenthubitemtypedetail.name: ContentHubItemTypeDetail
contenthubitemtypedetail.description: The details of an item type associated with a repository folder.

contenthubitemtypesummary.name: ContentHubItemTypeSummary
contenthubitemtypesummary.description: The summary of an item type associated with a repository folder.

createcreditmemoinputrepresentation.name: CreateCreditMemoInputRepresentation
createcreditmemoinputrepresentation.description: A list of change orders used to create a credit memo.

createcreditmemooutputrepresentation.name: CreateCreditMemoOutputRepresentation

customlistaudiencecriteria.name: CustomListAudienceCriteria
customlistaudiencecriteria.description: Criteria for the custom list type of custom recommendation audience.

dashboardcomponent​snapshot.name: DashboardComponent​Snapshot
dashboardcomponent​snapshot.description: Represents both dashboard component snapshots and alerts you receive when a dashboard component value crosses a threshold.

dashboardcomponent​snapshotcapability.name: DashboardComponent​SnapshotCapability
dashboardcomponent​snapshotcapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has a dashboard component snapshot. A snapshot is a static image of a dashboard component at a specific point in time.

datacloud.name: Datacloud
datacloud.description: Purchase Data.com contact or company records, and retrieve purchase information.

datacloudcompanies.name: DatacloudCompanies
datacloudcompanies.description: Lists all companies that were purchased in a specific order, page URLs, and the number of companies in the order.

datacloudcontacts.name: DatacloudContacts
datacloudcontacts.description: Lists all contacts that were purchased in the specific order, page URLs, and the number of contacts in the order.

datacloudpurchaseusage.name: DatacloudPurchaseUsage
datacloudpurchaseusage.description: Information about Data.com point usage for monthly and list pool users.

deleteintents.description: List of delete intents for a social post.

deletesocialpostintent.name: DeleteSocialPostIntent

digestjob.name: DigestJob
digestjob.description: Represents a successfully enqueued API digest job request.

directmessagememberpage.name: DirectMessageMemberPage
directmessagememberpage.description: A collection of direct message members.

emailmergefieldcollectioninfo.name: EmailMergeFieldCollectionInfo
emailmergefieldcollectioninfo.description: The merge fields for an object.

emailmergefieldinfo.name: EmailMergeFieldInfo
emailmergefieldinfo.description: The map for objects and their merge fields.

emailmergefieldservice.name: EmailMergeFieldService
emailmergefieldservice.description: Extract a list of merge fields for an object. A merge field is a field you can put in an email template, mail merge template, custom link, or formula to incorporate values from a record.

ensurefundsasyncinputrepresentation.name: EnsureFundsAsyncInputRepresentation
ensurefundsasyncinputrepresentation.description: ID of an invoice to ensure funds or capture payment for.

ensurefundsasyncoutputrepresentation.name: EnsureFundsAsyncOutputRepresentation
ensurefundsasyncoutputrepresentation.description: ID of the background operation that interacts with the payment provider.

ensurerefundsasyncinputrepresentation.name: EnsureRefundsAsyncInputRepresentation
ensurerefundsasyncinputrepresentation.description: ID of a credit memo to ensure refunds for.

ensurerefundsasyncoutputrepresentation.name: EnsureRefundsAsyncOutputRepresentation
ensurerefundsasyncoutputrepresentation.description: ID of the background operation that interacts with the payment provider.

entityrecommendation.name: EntityRecommendation
entityrecommendation.description: A Chatter, custom, or static recommendation.

externalemailservices.name: ExternalEmailServices
externalemailservices.description: Access information about integration with external email services, such as sending email within Salesforce through an external email account.

externalfilepermissioninformation.name: ExternalFilePermissionInformation
externalfilepermissioninformation.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has one or more extension attachments.

features.name: Features
features.description: Features available to the context user in the org.

feedelement.name: FeedElement
feedelement.description: Feed elements are the top-level items that a feed contains. Feeds are feed element containers.

feedelementinput.name: FeedElementInput
feedelementinput.description: Feed elements are the top-level items that a feed contains. Feeds are feed element containers.

feedelement​capabilities.name: FeedElement​Capabilities
feedelement​capabilities.description: A container for all capabilities that can be included with a feed element.

feedelement​capabilityinput.name: FeedElement​CapabilityInput
feedelement​capabilityinput.description: A feed element capability. This class is abstract and has no public constructor. You can make an instance only of a subclass.

feedentityiseditable.name: FeedEntityIsEditable
feedentityiseditable.description: Indicates if the context user can edit a feed element or comment.

feedentitynotavailablesummary.name: FeedEntityNotAvailableSummary
feedentitynotavailablesummary.description: A summary when the feed entity isn’t available.

feedentityreadsummary.name: FeedEntityReadSummary
feedentityreadsummary.description: Summary of the feed post or comment that was read.

feedentityshare​capabilityinput.name: FeedEntityShare​CapabilityInput
feedentityshare​capabilityinput.description: Share a feed entity with a feed post or comment.

feedentitysummary.name: FeedEntitySummary
feedentitysummary.description: The summary of a feed entity that is shared with a feed element.

feedreadsummary.name: FeedReadSummary
feedreadsummary.description: Summary of the feed that was read.

filepreviewurl.name: FilePreviewUrl
filepreviewurl.description: A URL to a file preview.

followintents.name: FollowIntents
followintents.description: A list of follow intents for a social persona.

followsocialpersonaintent.name: FollowSocialPersonaIntent
followsocialpersonaintent.description: Follow intent on a social persona.

fulfillmentgroupinputrepresentation.name: FulfillmentGroupInputRepresentation
fulfillmentgroupinputrepresentation.description: An OrderDeliveryGroupSummary that defines a delivery method and recipient, and a list of fulfillment groups to assign to FulfillmentOrders. Each fulfillment group is a set of OrderItemSummaries that match the OrderDeliveryGroupSummary and share the same fulfillment location. The method creates a FulfillmentOrder for each fulfillment group and a FulfillmentOrderLineItem for each OrderItemSummary.

fulfillmentorderinputrepresentation.name: FulfillmentOrderInputRepresentation
fulfillmentorderinputrepresentation.description: An OrderDeliveryGroupSummary that defines a delivery method and recipient, and a list of fulfillment groups to assign to FulfillmentOrders. Each fulfillment group is a set of OrderItemSummaries that match the OrderDeliveryGroupSummary and share the same fulfillment location. The method creates a FulfillmentOrder for each fulfillment group and a FulfillmentOrderLineItem for each OrderItemSummary.

fulfillmentorderinvoiceinputrepresentati.name: FulfillmentOrderInvoiceInputRepresentation
fulfillmentorderinvoiceinputrepresentati.description: Instantiate and include this object with no properties when creating an invoice.

fulfillmentorderlineiteminputrepresentat.name: FulfillmentOrderLineItemInputRepresentation
fulfillmentorderlineiteminputrepresentat.description: A FulfillmentOrderLineItem and quantity to cancel. You can cancel less than the full quantity, in which case you reallocate the canceled quantity to a different FulfillmentOrder.

fulfillmentorderlineitemstocancelinputre.name: FulfillmentOrderLineItemsToCancelInputRepresentation
fulfillmentorderlineitemstocancelinputre.description: A list of FulfillmentOrderLineItems and quantities to cancel.

fulfillmentorderoutputrepresentation.name: FulfillmentOrderOutputRepresentation
fulfillmentorderoutputrepresentation.description: A list of IDs of the created FulfillmentOrders.

genericfeedelement.name: GenericFeedElement
genericfeedelement.description: A concrete implementation of the abstract ConnectApi.FeedElement class.

grouprecord.name: GroupRecord
grouprecord.description: A record associated with a group.

grouprecordpage.name: GroupRecordPage
grouprecordpage.description: A paginated list of ConnectApi.GroupRecord objects.

hidesocialpostintent.name: HideSocialPostIntent
hidesocialpostintent.description: Hide intent for a social post.

inlineimagesegment.name: InlineImageSegment
inlineimagesegment.description: An inline image in the feed body.

knowledge.name: Knowledge
knowledge.description: Access information about trending articles in communities.

knowledgearticleversioncollection.name: KnowledgeArticleVersionCollection
knowledgearticleversioncollection.description: A collection of knowledge article versions.

likeintent.name: LikeIntent
likeintent.description: Like intent for a social post.

likeintents.name: LikeIntents
likeintents.description: List of like intents for a social post.

likesocialpostintent.name: LikeSocialPostIntent
likesocialpostintent.description: Like intent on a social post.

linkcapabilityinput.description: Create or update a link on a feed element.

managedcontentassociations.description: Content topics associated with managed content.

managedcontentdateandtimenodevalue.description: Managed content node of date and time type.

managedcontenttextnodevalue.description: Managed content node of text type.

managedsocialaccounts.name: ManagedSocialAccounts
managedsocialaccounts.description: A list of managed social accounts.

managedtopic.name: ManagedTopic
managedtopic.description: Represents a managed topic in a community.

managedtopicpositioncollectioninput.name: ManagedTopicPositionCollectionInput
managedtopicpositioncollectioninput.description: A collection of relative positions of managed topics.

managedtopicpositioninput.name: ManagedTopicPositionInput
managedtopicpositioninput.description: Relative position of a managed topic.

managedtopics.name: ManagedTopics
managedtopics.description: Access information about managed topics in a community. Create, delete, and reorder managed topics.

markupbeginsegment.name: MarkupBeginSegment
markupbeginsegment.description: The beginning of rich text markup.

markupbeginsegmentinput.description: The beginning tag for rich text markup.

markupendsegment.name: MarkupEndSegment
markupendsegment.description: The end of rich text markup.

markupendsegmentinput.name: MarkupEndSegmentInput
markupendsegmentinput.description: The end tag for rich text markup.

mentions.name: Mentions
mentions.description: Access information about mentions. A mention is an “@” character followed by a user or group name. When a user or group is mentioned, they receive a notification.

mentionsegmentinput.name: MentionSegmentInput
mentionsegmentinput.description: Include an @mention of a user or group in a feed post or comment. When creating a feed post or comment, you can include up to 25 mentions.

message​segment​input.name: Message​Segment​Input
message​segment​input.description: Used to add rich message segments to feed items and comments.

missions.name: Missions
missions.description: Export and purge mission activity for users. Get a user’s mission progress. Update mission activity counts for users.

moderationflagitemdetail.name: ModerationFlagItemDetail
moderationflagitemdetail.description: Flag details on a feed item, comment, or file.

moderation​capability.name: Moderation​Capability
moderation​capability.description: If a feed element has this capability, users in a community can flag it for moderation.

mutecapabilityinput.name: MuteCapabilityInput
mutecapabilityinput.description: Mute or unmute a feed element.

nbanativerecommendation.name: NBANativeRecommendation
nbanativerecommendation.description: A record the user is recommended to take action on.

nbarecommendation.name: NBARecommendation
nbarecommendation.description: A recommendation returned by a recommendation strategy.

nbarecommendations.name: NBARecommendations
nbarecommendations.description: Recommendations returned by a recommendation strategy.

newuseraudiencecriteriainput.description: Criteria for the new members type of custom recommendation audience.

nextbestaction.name: NextBestAction
nextbestaction.description: Execute recommendation strategies, get recommendations, manage recommendation reactions.

notfoundexception.name: NotFoundException
notfoundexception.description: Any issues with the specified resource being found. This is equivalent to receiving a 404 error from Chatter REST API.

ordersummaryinputrepresentation.name: OrderSummaryInputRepresentation
ordersummaryinputrepresentation.description: An order from which to create an OrderSummary.

ordersummaryoutputrepresentation.name: OrderSummaryOutputRepresentation
ordersummaryoutputrepresentation.description: ID of the created Order Summary.

pincapabilityinput.name: PinCapabilityInput
pincapabilityinput.description: Pin or unpin a feed element to a feed.

pinnedfeedelements.name: PinnedFeedElements
pinnedfeedelements.description: If a feed element has this capability, users who have permission can pin it to a feed.

platformaction.name: PlatformAction
platformaction.description: A platform action instance with state information for the context user.

platformactiongroup.name: PlatformActionGroup
platformactiongroup.description: A platform action group instance with state appropriate for the context user.

pollcapability.name: PollCapability
pollcapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it includes a poll.

pollcapabilityinput.name: PollCapabilityInput
pollcapabilityinput.description: Create, update, or vote on a poll on a feed element.

previewcanceloutputrepresentation.description: Expected change order financial values for a proposed return action.

previewreturnoutputrepresentation.name: PreviewReturnOutputRepresentation
previewreturnoutputrepresentation.description: Expected change order financial values for a proposed return action.

questionandanswers​capability.name: QuestionAndAnswers​Capability
questionandanswers​capability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has a question and comments on the feed element are answers to the question.

ratelimitexception.name: RateLimitException
ratelimitexception.description: When you exceed the rate limit. This is equivalent to receiving a 503 Service Unavailable error from Chatter REST API.

readby.name: ReadBy
readby.description: Information about who read the feed element and when.

readbycapabilityinput.description: Mark feed elements as read by the context user.

readbypage.name: ReadByPage
readbypage.description: A collection of information about who read the feed element and when.

recommendationreaction.description: A reaction to a recommendation produced by a recommendation strategy

recommendationreactioninput.name: RecommendationReactionInput
recommendationreactioninput.description: A reaction to a recommendation produced by a recommendation strategy.

recommendations.name: Recommendations
recommendations.description: Get and reject Chatter, custom, and static recommendations. Create, get, update, and delete custom recommendation audiences, custom recommendation definitions, and scheduled custom recommendations.

recommendedobject.name: RecommendedObject
recommendedobject.description: A recommended object, such as a custom or static recommendation.

records.name: Records
records.description: Access information about record motifs, which are small icons used to distinguish record types in the Salesforce UI.

recordsnapshot.name: RecordSnapshot
recordsnapshot.description: A record snapshot in a recommendation reaction.

relatedfeedposts.name: RelatedFeedPosts
relatedfeedposts.description: A collection of related feed posts.

replyintents.name: ReplyIntents
replyintents.description: List of reply intents for a social post.

repositoryfiledetail.name: RepositoryFileDetail
repositoryfiledetail.description: A detailed description of a repository file.

repositoryfilesummary.name: RepositoryFileSummary
repositoryfilesummary.description: A summary of a repository file.

repositoryfolderdetail.name: RepositoryFolderDetail
repositoryfolderdetail.description: A detailed description of a repository folder.

repositoryfolderitemscollection.name: RepositoryFolderItemsCollection
repositoryfolderitemscollection.description: A collection of repository folder items.

repositoryfoldersummary.name: RepositoryFolderSummary
repositoryfoldersummary.description: A summary of a repository folder.

requestheader.name: RequestHeader
requestheader.description: An HTTP request header name and value pair.

requestheaderinput.name: RequestHeaderInput
requestheaderinput.description: An HTTP request header name and value pair.

salesforceinbox.description: Access information about Automated Activity Capture, which is available in Einstein and Salesforce Inbox.

scheduledrecommendationinput.name: ScheduledRecommendationInput
scheduledrecommendationinput.description: List of social post ids and the action to approve or reject publishing them.

scheduledrecommendationpage.name: ScheduledRecommendationPage
scheduledrecommendationpage.description: A list of scheduled custom recommendations.

socialaccountrelationship.name: SocialAccountRelationship
socialaccountrelationship.description: Follow relationship between a managed social account and a social persona.

socialengagement.name: SocialEngagement
socialengagement.description: Manage information about social accounts or fan pages for social networks.

socialpostintents.name: SocialPostIntents
socialpostintents.description: Intents available for a social post.

socialpostmassapprovalinput.name: SocialPostMassApprovalInput
socialpostmassapprovalinput.description: List of social post ids and the action to approve or reject publishing them.

socialpostmassapprovaloutput.name: SocialPostMassApprovalOutput
socialpostmassapprovaloutput.description: Approval or rejection of a large number of social posts.

statuscapabilityinput.name: StatusCapabilityInput
statuscapabilityinput.description: Change the status of a feed post or comment.

strategytrace.name: StrategyTrace
strategytrace.description: Messages and trace nodes for a recommendation strategy execution.

strategytracenode.name: StrategyTraceNode
strategytracenode.description: A trace node for a recommendation strategy execution.

streamsubscriptioninput.name: StreamSubscriptionInput
streamsubscriptioninput.description: An entity to subscribe to for a Chatter feed stream.

submitcanceloutputrepresentation.name: SubmitCancelOutputRepresentation
submitcanceloutputrepresentation.description: ID of the change order created for a return action, and a set of its financial values.

submitreturnoutputrepresentation.name: SubmitReturnOutputRepresentation
submitreturnoutputrepresentation.description: ID of the change order created for a return action, and a set of its financial values.

topicinput.name: TopicInput
topicinput.description: Update a topic’s name or description or merge topics.

topics.name: Topics
topics.description: Access information about topics, such as their descriptions, the number of people talking about them, related topics, and information about groups contributing to the topic. Update a topic’s name or description, merge topics, and add and remove topics from records and feed items.

topicscapability.name: TopicsCapability
topicscapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, the context user can add topics to it. Topics help users organize and discover conversations.

topicscapability​input.name: TopicsCapability​Input
topicscapability​input.description: Assign topics to a feed element.

trackedchangebundlecapability.name: TrackedChangeBundleCapability
trackedchangebundlecapability.description: If a feed element has this capability, it has a group of other feed elements aggregated into one feed element called a bundle. This type of bundle aggregates feed tracked changes.

updownvotecapability.name: UpDownVoteCapability
updownvotecapability.description: If a feed post or comment has this capability, users can upvote or downvote it.

updownvotecapabilityinput.name: UpDownVoteCapabilityInput
updownvotecapabilityinput.description: Upvote or downvote a feed element or a comment.

usergroupdetailpage.name: UserGroupDetailPage
usergroupdetailpage.description: A page of groups that a user is a member of.

usermissionactivitycollection.name: UserMissionActivityCollection
usermissionactivitycollection.description: List of mission activities for a user.

usermissionactivitystatus.name: UserMissionActivityStatus
usermissionactivitystatus.description: Status of mission activity for a user.

userprofiles.name: UserProfiles
userprofiles.description: Access user profile data. The user profile data populates the profile page (also called the Chatter profile page). This data includes user information (such as address, manager, and phone number), some user capabilities (permissions), and a set of subtab apps, which are custom tabs on the profile page.

vote.name: Vote
vote.description: An upvote or downvote on a feed element or comment.

votepage.name: VotePage
votepage.description: A page of upvotes or downvotes on a feed element or comment.

zones.name: Zones
zones.description: Access information about Chatter Answers zones in your organization. Zones organize questions into logical groups, with each zone having its own focus and unique questions.

​actionlinktemplate​bindinginput.name: ​ActionLinkTemplate​BindingInput
​actionlinktemplate​bindinginput.description: A key-value pair to fill in a binding variable value from an action link template.

To associate an action link group with a feed element, the call must be made from the Apex namespace that created the action link definition. In addition, the user making the call must have created the definition or have View All Data permission.
